amendment.description: An amendment numbered 125 printed in the Congressional Record to change the date of enactment to be the date on which the Secretary certified that Russia's invasion of Ukraine has ended.

action.text: Mr. Armstrong raised a point of order against the Quigley amendment (A059). Mr. Armstrong stated the provisions of the amendment exceeds the scope of the bill and the amendment is therefore, not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Quigley.
